Text: I have met Bob and had the pleasure of singing with him. He is not only an amazingly gifted singer and songwriter, but is a truly gracious person.  If you download his albums and like them, please consider buying them.  I'm sure Bob (and God) would appreciate that a great deal!!!

REPHRASE:  do not "consider" buying them, actually DO BUY THEM...   Visit Bob's page at
http://www.bob-bennett.com.  You can paypal to buy the original autographed album!!!
